name: Rock-paper-scissors Birthdays
description:
This game was created for Low Effort Jam 14.

https://itch.io/jam/low-effort-jam-14

This is a simple life game.

[Usage]

- Left Mouse Click: Bring blue life into the world!

- Right Mouse Click: display on/off screen text.

Clear the stage by reducing the number of red lives displayed on the screen to a certain number, and reducing the percentage of blue and green lives to a certain number.

There are 10 stages in total.

[Rule]

- The blue preys on the red.

- Red preys on green.

- Green preys on blue.

- Mouse click power will be recovered in a certain time.
